attributes.review: this app was an absolute mess! It took forever to download and when it did, it kept closing itself!! It's full of bugs and does not function properly at all. Please get rid of this app off the AppStore so others don't experience this TERRIBLE experience!!!!
attributes.title: useless

attributes.review: This app takes forever to download and drains you battery life even when you are not using it regardless of privacy settings. Once I downloaded it, campaign staff have been knocking on my door. Waste of time and data.
attributes.title: Wasted battery life

attributes.review: disgusting i love my chee- sorry, president but this app is just horrible. while i was on the app my mom called me tell me our pet crocodile escaped and then my phone completely blacked out and then i got a call saying it was from the trump administration telling me to go back to my country, when i was born here😥. but whatever trump says, 1/4 of me with the colonizers blood will be going back to spain and the other 3/4 will stay here being this had once been mexico. ty you luv trump2020🇺🇸⚒👺
attributes.title: 🧚🏽‍♀️✨all apps matter✨🧚🏽‍♀️just not this one✨💗

attributes.review: The design of the app is horrible. It is impossible to find anything, it took forever to load and anytime I tried to log in it would reject my number and tell me it wrong EVEN THOUGH I COPY AND PASTED UT FROM MY CONTACTS. How can someone use an app you can’t even log into. Disgusting.
attributes.title: Absolutley horrible

attributes.review: I was hoping this would be a political campaign app that I could rely on to see what’s going on...not the case. It’s so jumbled and difficult to navigate. At first the rewards seem promising but really not worth it in the end. If I could rate this no stars I would :/
attributes.title: Seriously?????

attributes.review: The app took me 72 hours to complete and when i got on it said to delete because it is a error and i had to delete and I download it back and it told me where my location was and said that we are coming for u
attributes.title: Be safe the app is dangerous

attributes.review: As soon as I opened the app my phone crashed. Not funny. When I finally got my phone to work again and went to try the app again it happened again and again. When I finally got it to work I was met with one of Willy Wonka’s Oompa Loompas. 😒
attributes.title: Absolutely Disgusting

attributes.review: Downloaded the app to find reasons to vote for trump... didn’t find any. On top of that the app malfunctions and should not be on the App Store all in all. It’s a real bad look for Apple business, y’all honestly should’ve never even thought to allow this app to be up here from the jump. Yikes!
attributes.title: TRASH, DONT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review:
When I downloaded this app it took 4 days to download and once it downloaded it made my phone crash and once my phone started to work again I opened the app and it told me that my whole family and I where ugly 
1/10 do not recommend
attributes.title: DELETE THIS APP

attributes.review: This app took so long to download, it took more than 24 hours and I was not satisfied. I thought it would give me updates on my president but the app is too cluttered and doesn’t even open right. If I could give it zero stars I would.
attributes.title: Do not download
